name: Muse
body:
## Usage ##

```
$ muse artist name
``` 
Here is an example for one of history greatest:
![live demo](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8273519/13554562/a453d4c8-e3b3-11e5-8dc9-18da468bbb61.gif)

Use the config file to change the number of entries for top tracks and albums.

## Install ##

You'll need [jq](https://stedolan.github.io/jq/), [youtube-dl](https://rg3.github.io/youtube-dl/), vlc and a [last.fm api key](www.last.fm/api) (see the config file, `.muserc`)
```
$ sudo apt-get install youtube-dl jq vlc
$ git clone https://github.com/mihaiolteanu/muse
$ sudo cp muse.sh /usr/local/bin/muse
$ cp .muserc ~/.muserc
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
